## MAXIMUM\_BORROWING\_RATE variable

Value that the [borrowing rate](./stablecoin-lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) will never exceed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
MAXIMUM_BORROWING_RATE: Decimal
```
